title: 【Final Dual Degree Seminar of The Year】 - Save the Date!
department: 國際事務處國際合作組
author: 陳良愛
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 國際事務處國際合作組 - 陳良愛 - ice@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5107
對象： 全校教師_全校學生
標題： 【Final Dual Degree Seminar of The Year】 - Save the Date!
日期： Tue, 21 Nov 2023 15:25:02 +0800
附檔： 1019_DUAL DEGREE SEMINAR.jpg (1 MB)   
[Final Information Session of the Year: San Francisco State University] (Teacher Alex from sister school personally visiting Dong Hwa for presentation)
Date: 11/27
Time: 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM
Location: Administration Building, Room 301
Online Meeting Room: https://meet.google.com/jjb-jejt-tjm
Event Registration Link: https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/XSL_ApplyRWD/ActAnnounce.aspx?ActID=18715


The session will be conducted both in person and online simultaneously. Meal boxes will be provided at the venue, available until they run out. Students are welcome to seize the opportunity and sign up to participate.
